mapper.select: select id, staff_id, task_title, content, status, create_date, complate_date, si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from agent_info ai left join staff_info si on (si.id = ai.staff_id) left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1 order by ai.create_date desc
